summary: The diff addresses all four requirements (REQ-28, REQ-29, REQ-30, REQ-31) with comprehensive changes to App.tsx, Layout.tsx, BottomTabNavigation.tsx, all page components, and useQueries.ts. All routes are registered, pages have loading/error guards, query enabled flags protect against uninitialized actor, and the Layout correctly uses Outlet. No significant missing requirements or hallucinated features were found.
